name: SELF (itch) (Alex FC, Dotto Meister)
description:
Self is a short storytelling game where you control a character who is trapped in a strange reality.

Controls

KeyboardWASD / Arrows
MoveCTRL / Z
InteractSpacebar / X
AttackQ / Enter
ConfirmGamepadDpadMoveX button
InteractA button
AttackStart button
Confirm

Obs: Press R for reset game data.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019
